women.name: Love Parade with Donald Riche
women.description: Between two different worlds, going in and out of character and showcasing the versatility of women's styles from the Riche Love Parade collection.

men.name: Merging Codes with Alessandro Michele
men.description: Designed by Creative Director Alessandro Michele, merging the emblems of the House with those of the iconic sportswear brand. The collection expands on the sartorial streetwear creations with a spectrum of sport-inspired pieces in which the heritage of both brands is encoded in a trio of lines.

beauty.name: This is the beauty list
beauty.description: beauty is in the eye of the beholder

handbags.name: Welcome to handbags
handbags.description: Handbags are just bags that hold hands *hits blunt*

force.name: Welcome to Force, by Gage
force.description: Designed by the one and only - Kanye West
